text:
Natasha Chandel is a Canadian actress and TV producer based in Los Angeles. Natasha is known for starring and directing the web series "Mumbai Chopra: Misadventures of an It Girl". She was named "leading Protégé for creativity" by Lancôme Mille Femmes.
Career.
Natasha was born in Sharjah, UAE. Natasha has worked as a producer for top networks such Maker Studios- Disney Digital Network, CBC, Rogers Television and MTV News. In 2016, she created and began hosting the dating podcast "KINDA DATING", which has featured Sunny Leone, Laura Clery and Dr. Wendy Walsh. Natasha has also appeared as a leading actress in several TV series including "Mumbai Chopra: Misadventures of an It Girl", "The Can", "The Mindy Project" and "M.V.P".
In 2014, she created, wrote and directed a branded web series The Can, which consisted of three episodes.
